ComicInfo.Summary: Holo-ween [Part 1]: Following a stressful mission and looking for a chance to help the crew relax, Counselor Troi proposes to Captain Picard to help the crew overcome their anxiety and fears be celebrating the ancient Earth custom of celebrating Halloween. As Data searches Starfleet records for data involving fear and horror, the Enterprise attracts the attention of Redjac, a manifestation of fear who takes over the holodeck and uses it to cause crew members to be overcome by their fears.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 23:03:12. [CVDB1021490] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:06:06. [Issue ID 2571565]

ComicInfo.Title: Holo-ween [Part 1]
